name: Tictactocalypse
description:
Tictactocalypse is a funnier, realtime and apocalyptic version of the game TicTac-Toe. Players battle to place piece on a board, and trigger events in order to disrupt others! Play up to four players at the same time!

I made this game for a game design class I took last year, still a prototype, but finished enough to be fun and shared on this site!

How to play is described in the file 'TICTACTOCALYPSE FINAL.pdf', that is the final document I had to write to this class.
